law.catch_line: Property subject to forfeiture under this title may be seized:...

text.section:
The seizing authority that seizes money that is contraband shall immediately:
photograph the contraband money and record the quantity of each denomination of coin or currency seized; and
deposit the money to the account of the appropriate local financial authority.
A photograph taken under subsection (b) of this section may be substituted for money as evidence in a criminal or forfeiture proceeding.
